stressor-category-vocab
=======================

**Employment Status** (1)

    The insider's employment status changed

**Organizational Issues** (2)

    The insider's employer had problems or changes that directly or indirectly affected the insider

**Unmet Expectations** (3)

    Insider's expectations of their employer were not met

**Consequences for Previous Violations** (4)

    Consequences against the insider resulting from the insider's previous behavior or violations, not resulting from the incident itself
